oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Pass for Daniel Klein to leave the city of St. Louis
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Pass for Daniel Klein to "pass beyond the limits of the City and County of St. Louis, to go to Ill." from the Provost Marshall. On the reverse is a signed oath of allegiance to the United States. Klein was 5'6" tall with black eyes and black hair and no; noted peculiarities. Klein was born in 1837 in Albessen, Bavaria, Germany and died in 1913 in Union County, Ill. St. Louis was home to a large German-American community from which several Union regiments were drawn during the war.
